channel.title: How do you mute a player on fr33sc4p3 source?
channel.description:
hi all, I was just wondering how you mute a player on the fr33c4p3 source, because it is really annoying when people keep macroing and auto typing, so instead of banning i could mute, so how do I do it?
Many Thanks James[br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2007, 12:47:19 PM[/size][hr]u need 2 add?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2007, 01:51:48 PM[/size][hr]::mute namehere dont work![br][size=1]Posted on: June 19, 2007, 11:59:40 PM[/size][hr]i must give up :(((
